desc: The Engaging Web: How Fun and Games Improve Your Site shows web developers how to incorporate games into websites. This book will help you decode the possibilities and provide a series of proven and tangible strategies that any web developer, producer, or product manager can use to implement games in their website. Whether you're looking to make games the centerpiece of your site, an added-value feature, or you just want to engage and excite your users, The Engaging Web will help you develop a strategy that harnesses the power of games.
title: The Engaging Web
